vernac_cmds: Local Notation "[| x |]" := (ZnZ.to_Z x) (at level 0, x at level 99).
Definition eq (n m : t) := [| n |] = [| m |].
Hint Rewrite ZnZ.spec_0 ZnZ.spec_1 ZnZ.spec_succ ZnZ.spec_pred ZnZ.spec_add ZnZ.spec_mul ZnZ.spec_sub : cyclic.
Ltac zify := unfold eq, zero, one, two, succ, pred, add, sub, mul in *; autorewrite with cyclic.
Ltac zcongruence := repeat red; intros; zify; congruence.
Program Instance succ_wd : Proper (eq ==> eq) succ.
Program Instance pred_wd : Proper (eq ==> eq) pred.
Program Instance add_wd : Proper (eq ==> eq ==> eq) add.
Program Instance sub_wd : Proper (eq ==> eq ==> eq) sub.
Program Instance mul_wd : Proper (eq ==> eq ==> eq) mul.
apply Zpower_gt_1; unfold Z.lt; auto with zarith.
pose proof gt_wB_1; auto with zarith.
Lemma succ_mod_wB : forall n : Z, (n + 1) mod wB = ((n mod wB) + 1) mod wB.
Lemma pred_mod_wB : forall n : Z, (n - 1) mod wB = ((n mod wB) - 1) mod wB.
Lemma NZ_to_Z_mod : forall n, [| n |] mod wB = [| n |].
Theorem pred_succ : forall n, P (S n) == n.
replace ([| n |] + 1 - 1)%Z with [| n |] by ring.
Hypothesis AS : forall n, A n <-> A (S n).
Lemma BS : forall n : Z, 0 <= n -> n < wB - 1 -> B n -> B (n + 1).
symmetry; apply Zmod_small; auto with zarith.
Theorem Zbounded_induction : (forall Q : Z -> Prop, forall b : Z, Q 0 -> (forall n, 0 <= n -> n < b - 1 -> Q n -> Q (n + 1)) -> forall n, 0 <= n -> n < b -> Q n)%Z.
set (Q' := fun n => (n < b /\ Q n) \/ (b <= n)).
assert (H : forall n, 0 <= n -> Q' n).
split; [auto with zarith | now apply (QS n)].
unfold Q' in *; intros n H1 H2.
destruct (H n H1) as [[H3 H4] | H3].
Lemma B_holds : forall n : Z, 0 <= n < wB -> B n.
Theorem bi_induction : forall n, A n.
Theorem add_0_l : forall n, 0 + n == n.
Theorem add_succ_l : forall n m, (S n) + m == S (n + m).
repeat rewrite Zplus_mod_idemp_l; try apply gt_wB_0.
Theorem sub_0_r : forall n, n - 0 == n.
Theorem sub_succ_r : forall n m, n - (S m) == P (n - m).
Theorem mul_succ_l : forall n m, (S n) * m == n * m + m.

command: apply Zpower_gt_1; unfold Z.lt; auto with zarith.
pose proof gt_wB_1; auto with zarith.
replace ([| n |] + 1 - 1)%Z with [| n |] by ring.
symmetry; apply Zmod_small; auto with zarith.
set (Q' := fun n => (n < b /\ Q n) \/ (b <= n)).
assert (H : forall n, 0 <= n -> Q' n).
split; [auto with zarith | now apply (QS n)].
unfold Q' in *; intros n H1 H2.
destruct (H n H1) as [[H3 H4] | H3].
repeat rewrite Zplus_mod_idemp_l; try apply gt_wB_0.
